message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at a special price of $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it offers.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95? I believe this would still provide a good deal for both of us.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $95 is a bit too low for me to consider. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $105?
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $100 for the product. This aligns better with my budget while still acknowledging the value of the item.
